name: Who's the Dork with the Boombox?
name_original: Who's the Dork with the Boombox?
description:
You are Boombox Guy and music is your life. Collect cassette tapes to get cred and fend off threatening enemies by firing your boombox at them! Watch out for water and electricity!

WASD to move. Left mouse to fire. And ESC to pause.
